Episodes.Title: Anthony's Friend
Episodes.Plot:
Songs: Marching Along & Dorothy's Birthday Party; Ponies; Henry?s Dance

Anthony wakes up everyone when he plays with his invisible friend, Morty the giant turtle.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Field, Maria Silvestrini, Greg Truman

Episodes.Title: Murray's Shirt
Episodes.Plot:
Songs: Numbers Rhumba; The Monkey Dance; Henry The Octopus 

Murray's missing his Red Shirt, so he tries on a Hawaiian shirt.  But can the other Wiggles recognize him?
Henry packs for an underwater picnic.
Captain Feathersword tries to train Wags with an obedience whistle.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Field, Maria Silvestrini, Greg Truman

Episodes.Title: Building Blocks
Episodes.Plot:
Songs: Quack Quack; I Am a Dancer; I Love It When It Rains 

The Wiggles hold a Building Block Competition.
Henry the Octopus and Joey the Crab go on an Alphabet adventure.
Captain Feathersword teaches Wags how to fish.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Field, Maria Silvestrini, Greg Truman

Episodes.Title: Everybody's Asleep!/Puff Puff, Toot Toot!
Episodes.Plot:
Songs: Havenu Shalom Alechem; Joannie Works With One Hammer; Whenever I Hear This Music 

The Wiggles wait for the mechanic to fix their Big Red Car.
Henry cooks a sea feast for his band mates.
Captain Feathersword tickles Wags while he's planting a tree.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Field, Maria Silvestrini, Greg Truman

Episodes.Title: Shalom!/The Hat Parade
Episodes.Plot: The Wiggles receive a visit from Lilly, a famous movie star.  They prepare to show their best impression.  Lilly asks them to show off their talents and whoever does the best gets to be a star in her next movie.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Field, Maria Silvestrini, Greg Truman
